--- Page 1 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
In accordance with IMTAR – 21, Subpart C1, 21.C1.18, Subpart C2, 21.C2.9 & Subpart C3, 21.C3.1.20.
Part - I (Reference): Incident /Accident/ Snag / Explosive
a) Defect Report (DR) No: DR/2024/0202 b) Date of Occurrence: 27/01/2023
c) Installation Details: Medusa Strike - AC-2551-743 at
Central Command Hub
Part - II: (Details of Defective Component)
a) Trade: Propulsion b) Date Component 06/02/2023
Received:
c) System/Sub System: Fuel Injection d) Main Assembly: Wing Root Starboard
e) Nomenclature: Fuel Injection Assembly Unit f) MOD Status: Upgraded
g) Part No.: PR-5347-W2 h) Sl No.: SN-5104-476
i) Firmware Version: Not Applicable j) Software Version: Not Applicable
k) Date of Installation: 19/12/2021 l) Date of Removal: 03/02/2023
Pg No: 146 Ln No: 24 Pg No: 10 Ln No: 4
m) Manufacturing Agency: Epsilon Avionics Ltd n) Date, Month & Year September 2017
of Manufacturing:
o) Whether under warranty: Yes p) Whether under AMC Yes
/ Repair Contract:
q) Life completed since New: 3396 Hrs / 488 Cycles

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Compressor stall during acceleration. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel Injection component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 07/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

--- Page 3 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part VI: Remarks by Quality Dept.
Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type.
Date: 09/03/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta
Part VII: Remarks by User(Project):(if applicable)
User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations.
Date: 10/03/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
Part VIII: Remarks by ORDAQA (Quality Aspects)
Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions.
Date: 14/03/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
Part IX: Remarks by CEMILAC / RCMA (Design Aspects)
Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type.
Date: 17/03/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer
Edition Number: 1.0 Form Version Number: 1.0 Date: January 2021
